/usr/bin/c++ -fPIC   -g -Wl,--fatal-warnings -Wl,--no-undefined -lc   -shared -Wl,-soname,libvtkImagingStatistics-6.2.so.1 -o ../../lib/libvtkImagingStatistics-6.2.so.1 CMakeFiles/vtkImagingStatistics.dir/vtkImageAccumulate.cxx.o CMakeFiles/vtkImagingStatistics.dir/vtkImageHistogram.cxx.o CMakeFiles/vtkImagingStatistics.dir/vtkImageHistogramStatistics.cxx.o  -Wl,-rpath,/home/jeff/codes/vtk-v6.2.0/build/lib: ../../lib/libvtkImagingCore-6.2.so.1 ../../lib/libvtkCommonExecutionModel-6.2.so.1 ../../lib/libvtkCommonDataModel-6.2.so.1 ../../lib/libvtkCommonMisc-6.2.so.1 ../../lib/libvtkCommonSystem-6.2.so.1 ../../lib/libvtkCommonTransforms-6.2.so.1 ../../lib/libvtkCommonMath-6.2.so.1 ../../lib/libvtkCommonCore-6.2.so.1 -Wl,-rpath-link,/home/jeff/codes/vtk-v6.2.0/build/lib
